name: create_contact
description: Creates a new contact in your Google Contacts using the provided personal details.

email.description: Unique email address for the contact.

name: delete_contact
description: Deletes a contact by its resource name from Google Contacts, excluding directory contacts and 'otherContacts'.

resource_name.description: Resource name of the contact to delete, formatted as `people/*`.

name: get_contact
description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific contact using their resource name or email address.

identifier.description: The contact's resource name (`people/*`) or email address.

name: get_other_contacts
description: Retrieves contacts for people you have interacted with but not explicitly added to your contacts.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (positive integer, default: 50).

name: list_contacts
description: Retrieves a list of Google contacts, optionally filtering by name.

name_filter.description: The name to filter contacts by; if omitted, all contacts are returned.

max_results.description: Maximum number of contacts to return (default: 100).

name: list_workspace_users
description: Lists Google Workspace users in your organization's directory, with options to filter results and limit the number returned.

query.description: A search term to find users by their name, email address, or phone number.

max_results.description: A positive integer specifying the maximum number of results to return, which defaults to 50.

name: search_contacts
description: Searches for contacts by name, email, or phone number, optionally limiting the number of results.

query.description: The search term for finding contacts by name, email, or phone number.

max_results.description: A positive integer specifying the maximum number of results to return (default: 10).

name: search_directory
description: Searches for people in your organization's Google Workspace directory.

query.description: A search term for a member's name, email, or phone number.

max_results.description: The maximum number of results to return.

name: update_contact
description: Updates an existing contact with new information, requiring at least one optional parameter to be provided.

resource_name.description: The unique identifier for the contact, formatted as `people/*`.

email.description: The contact's new primary email address.
